author: Emily Glazer
title: Wells Fargo Directors Win Easily Despite Criticisms
text:
Wells Fargo & Co. re-elected all of its 12 board directors with more than 89% of preliminary votes, in a shift from the bank’s turbulent shareholder meeting last year.
Wells Fargo, which hosted the meeting in Des Moines, Iowa, near its mortgage-business headquarters, still heard complaints about Chief Executive Timothy Sloan, executive compensation and its relationship with the firearms industry during the 2 ½-hour-long meeting.
...
